page.title: 12INDUSTRY NEAR WYDDIAL
page.content: On the southern edge of the block the buildings of Silkmead Farm have been converted into light industrial units.They were originally broiler houses for poultry rearing.The two largest enterprises are a manufacturer of funiture and a precision engineering firm.There are also car repairers and car sprayers,these the individual occupations of one man as a rule. At Cave Gate an agricultural engineer has another one_man business.His mobile workshop can go out to farm machinery needing repairs in the field.He also does welding.
